item.title: nftables - basics
item.description: short nftables is the modern linux kernel (>= 3.13 nft support) packet classification framework to replace iptables. this post will get the basics and useful commands/rules for nftables and some usecases how nftables will configured in case of a nixos system in a default way. if you search for a advanced topic i recommend the nftables advanced router post (comming soon). need additional ideas or use cases? take a look at 50 things - nftables (comming soon).
